General.Name: Harfang Exploration Inc
General.Description: Harfang Exploration Inc., an exploration and evaluation stage company, primarily acquires and explores for mineral properties in Canada. The company explores for gold, copper, silver, nickel, chromium, platinum, palladium, and other metals. It focuses on the exploration and evaluation of its mineral properties in the James Bay area in the Province of Québec for precious metals. Harfang Exploration Inc. is headquartered in Montreal, Canada.
General.Address: 1100, avenue des Canadiens-de-MontrEal, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3B 2S2
